titles.title: A joint resolution to congratulate the crew of Stars and Stripes for their successful defense of the America's Cup.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 9/23/1988--Introduced. Authorizes and requests the President to congratulate and thank Dennis Connor and the crew of Stars and Stripes for showing what can be accomplished through work, technology, and skill, for instilling a sense of national pride, and for another job well done.
